data.title: 5 Star Luxury Hotel Leicester Square, London
data.meta_description: The Londoner, the world’s first super boutique hotel. Discover 5 star luxury hotel accommodation, innovative wellness, and curated dining in Leicester Square.
data.text:
The Residence with three spaces, including a drawing room, just for hotel guests, The Retreat with swimming pool, gym, sauna and steam room, hair salon, nail salon, gentlemen's barber and superfood bar, rooftop lounge bar and French Mediterranean restaurant, two Odeon Luxe screening rooms, six restaurants and bars, a ballroom, seven meeting rooms and function rooms.

Our rooms and suites offer Handcrafted Vispring mattress with 400 thread count Irish linen, floor-to-ceiling windows with a view of London, Samsung Smart TV, a velvet chaise longue or chair, curated artwork, fully stocked minibar, Dyson hairdryer, handheld steamer, Nespresso coffee, tea from The East India Company, Roberts Bluetooth radio and speakers, Miller Harris bath amenities, a spacious illuminated vanity, luxury Toto washlet, a rain shower, a wardrobe, and essential amenities.

Yes, we offer a range of accessible rooms. Please contact our reservations team to discuss your accessibility requirements and we will accommodate accordingly.

- Whitcomb's, our Mediterranean French restaurant.

- 8 at The Londoner, our Japanese restaurant and one of London's best rooftop bars.

- The Stage, one of London's Best Champagne Bars, serving breakfast and afternoon tea.

- Joshua's Tavern, our gin bar and gastro pub.

- Refuel, a health bar in the heart of London.

Valet parking is available at The Londoner, the cost is £90 per 24 hours, to pre-book your space please contact the concierge directly via concierge@thelondoner.com or +442072510120.

Available just for hotel guests, The Residence is a private place to work, relax and meet, offering complimentary snacks and soft drinks and full bar service. Seven large conference rooms and a foyer are available within The Gallery, whilst The Ballroom and The Green Room provide the best luxury event space and wedding venue in London. The Londoner also offers complimentary latest generation Wi-Fi 6 on unlimited devices.

Enjoy a picnic or leisurely stroll in St James’s Park, Green Park, Victoria Embankment Garden or Whitehall Gardens, all of which are within 10 minutes’ walk of The Londoner.

The Londoner shares Leicester Square with various corporate offices such as Global Radio, and is seconds from NFL International, Hearst Publishing and the Canadian Embassy, among others.

The Londoner is ideally located in central London’s iconic Leicester Square, which is just next to Covent Garden, Trafalgar Square, Piccadilly Circus, Soho and The Strand.

Yes, The Londoner is only a few moments’ walk from the National Gallery and Nelson’s Column. BFI Southbank, the Hayward Gallery, the London Transport Museum and the Royal Academy of ARTS are approximately 20 minutes’ walk.

The Londoner is located on Leicester Square – the heart of theatreland. There are 38 theatres in the West End, all of which are less than 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel, such as the Harold Pinter Theatre, Prince of Wales Theatre and the London Coliseum.
